scripts.factory:health: pnpm -r build && pnpm -C packages/contracts check:breaking && pnpm -C packages/evals eval:smoke && pnpm -C packages/evals check:no-agent-runtime-copies && pnpm -C packages/evals check:agent-manifests && pnpm -C packages/evals eval:agent-retrieval-smoke && pnpm -C packages/evals eval:agent-runner-smoke && pnpm -r typecheck
